text: Amazing fine dining experience! Food prepared by the chefs was superb, and love the open-concept yet cozy dining area. There were also small interesting stories behind the dishes, shared by the lovely female staff. They were very sweet to prepare a surprise birthday tart. We really enjoyed ourselves and definitely value for money!!

Nice dining experience over here. We have went there to celebrate for our 13th anniversary together with our kid. Food is decent and is as good as some of the Michelin starred restaurants that we have been to around the world. Thanks for the chef for the small gesture to serves us the noodle and is nice too!

A unique experience! Celebrating my brother's birthday at Kioku was the best decision. My typically conservative Teochew brother loved the 2.5-hour dining experience. The fusion of modern French and Italian cuisines, with Hungarian-sourced foie gras, was extraordinary. Every dish was a delightful surprise in presentation and flavor. The white and red wine pairings complemented the dishes perfectly. The ambiance was elegant yet cozy, and the staff were exceptionally attentive and friendly. Thank you, Kioku, for a memorable evening. We will definitely be back!

To the team of KIOKU, Thank you for the fabulous memories and thoughtful arrangement for my elderly parents whom cannot take raw food. They specifically enjoy the tomatoes with the 60 days fragmented vinegar. We truly enjoy the desserts and birthday treat for my mom. It is a trip not to miss when you are in Puteri Habour Area or visiting the Logo land. Do go early to catch the beautiful sunset üåÖ to create an amazing memories

The food is very evocative and they take great care in the ingredients they use, and you can appreciate the craftsmanship in the beautifully presented food! I didn't give it a 5 because the use of ingredients could have done with more surprises. Suggest going with your family and friends to experience the out-of JB deliciousness!
